Blog.post: Yep Gotta love 'em Poor Roomie roomerson... You are going to die tomorrow. Although I do love th BF. He is sleeping in my bed right now and I am still awake. It is 4 am. WHOOPS!!!!!! PS- my roommate is the coolest ever. She is taking me on a trip. So much better than a bass guitar!!!!
It smells like pee in my house - sickest

Why is it that I still think about them and wonder WTF they are doing? Why can't I just leave them well enough alone. For example - I logged into my old college email account and saw that my hs/college boyfriend had logged in the same day. I haven't checked that email account in 4 years - and yet the second I saw that - I just HAD to send him an email - WHY WHY WHY - he is effing married. He was going to marry me, but I was too scared and young to committ. But why can't I just leave well enough alone - why did I have to send the email - i am sure he is super happy not talking to me - And another one of my ex's is married already and expecting a baby - I am only 25 - and so are they - Granted all my ex's live in Texas and I live in DC - but is it so wrong to contact them - I really don't want to see them, I just want them to know I still think about them. Does that do any good though???? I wonder........

Well today has been crap so far... Its raining. Got in an argument with the BF. It was totally my fault. I am so effing moody - I actually just got all my stuff and left his house. I have never done anything so irrational to him before. Then as I am driving home, I decide to call him - he decided he didn't want to talk to me. SONOFA - I hate when I get a dose of my own medicine. So as I am driving home, I think to myself why I have not filled my paxil RX lately. Screw not taking it - my sanity is worth drug dependancy. So I decided that my I would pay my other aniexty ridden friend DM - or poison - a call. So I go over and watch Coupling and get a Wellburtin to even me out. It is working. He is currently at a Crawdad party with another friend. Now I am sitting at my house debating whether or not to call BF. We have dinner reservations tonight, but honestly I am not sure I even want to go. I am still in a funky ass mood and I don't want to get into another fight. I think I might go smoke now.
